QuestData.Title: Your Base, Your Choice
QuestData.Description: You have already constructed an impressive garrison in Frostfire. I believe I should defer this next choice to you.$b$bOne region of Gorgrond is rich in resources. A lumber mill could help us make the most of them.$b$bAnother region harbors hardened gladiators. A sparring arena would help persuade them to fight for our cause.$b$bEither path will strengthen us as we seek to find and weaken the Iron Horde.$b$bWhich do you choose, Commander?
QuestData.LogDescription: Choose to construct either a Lumber Mill or a Sparring Arena at Beastwatch.
QuestData.RewardText: A fine choice. It will need more work before such a structure could be built in your garrison, but this is a start.
